lines.text: in the function cmp with arguments a , b , x and l that returns integer
lines.code: int cmp ( int a , int b , string x , int l )

lines.text: assign value 0 to the integer t
loop incrementing a and b while a < l and b < l
lines.code: for ( ; a < l && b < l ; a ++ , b ++ )

lines.text: if x [ a ] is equal to x [ b ]

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < l - 1 ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = i + 1 to l exclusive

lines.text: if a [ i ] is equal to a [ j ]
assign value of cmp ( i , j , a , l ) to the t
lines.code: t = cmp ( i , j , a , l ) ;

lines.text: if t is greater than max , set max to t
print max and a new line
